member.name: T:RemindMe.Form1
member.summary: This is the main form. Control events will be handled here

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.MakeTodaysRemindersPopup
member.summary: makes the popup that shows howmany reminders are set for today

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.ResetControlValues(System.Windows.Forms.Panel)
member.summary: Resets all the controls to their original state.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.AddReminderToListview(System.Windows.Forms.ListView,Database.Entity.Reminder)
member.summary: Adds an reminder to the listview, showing the details of that reminder.
member.param: The listview
The reminder

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.FillSoundComboboxFromDatabase(System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox)
member.summary: Gets all the sounds from the database and fills the combobox with them.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.MakeReminderPopup(Database.Entity.Reminder)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of popup

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.MakeMessagePopup(System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: The message
The amount of seconds to wait before the popup goes down again

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.PlaceDayCheckBoxesPanel
member.summary: Adds the DayCheckBoxes panel between the layout and adjusts the location of the note textbox, and the buttons below it.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.PlaceComboboxMonthlyWeekly
member.summary: Adds the monthly combobox between the layout and adjusts the location of the note textbox, and the buttons below it.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.RemoveComboboxMonthlyWeekly
member.summary: Hides the week/monthly combobox between the layout and resets the location of the textbox and the buttons below it

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.FillControlsForEdit(Database.Entity.Reminder)
member.summary: Fills the controls of creating a new reminder with the data from the reminder

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.ShowOrHideExclamation
member.summary: Determines wether the exlamation sign should be visible or not, with an tooltip saying the entered date is invalid

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.pbCloseApplication_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes RemindMe to the system tray. RemindMe can be terminated through it's icon in the tray

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.IsDayCheckboxChecked(System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Checks if a day checkbox for the given day is checked
member.param: The day you want to check for selection
member.returns: True if the given day is selected, false if not

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.RemoveUnusedPropertiesFromReminders(Database.Entity.Reminder)
member.summary: Removes properties from a reminder that the reminder shouldn't have. Example: The reminder is a monthly reminder, but before editing it was a weekdays reminder. If that reminder is now monthly and it still has weekdays, it will be removed here

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.GetCommaSeperatedDayCheckboxesString
member.summary: gets all the checked day comboboxes and puts them into a string. example: monday,tuesday,friday

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.SetDateTimePickerMonthlyValue
member.summary: Sets the value to the DateTimePicker "dtpDate" after the user adds days to the monthly reminder

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.HideOrShowSkipForwardMenuItem
member.summary: When right-clicking reminder(s), this method will hide the skip to next date option if one of the reminder(s) does not have a next date.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.HideOrShowRemovePostponeMenuItem
member.summary: When right-clicking reminder(s), this method will hide the skip to next date option if one of the reminder(s) does not have a next date.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.GetDatesStringFromMultipleDatesComboBox
member.summary: Goes through all dates in the ComboBox cbMultipleDates and seperates them by a comma. Used for reminders with the repeat type None

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.GetDatesStringFromMonthlyDaysComboBox
member.summary: Goes through all the integer days in the combobox(1,3,25),makes dates from them and puts them into a string. Used for reminders with the repeat type monthly

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.MakeScrollingPopupMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an popup message from the bottom right corner that slowly moves up.
member.param: The message the popup should contain

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.HideScrollingPopupMessage
member.summary: Removes the scrolling popup message from view and reset's its location

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.StartMailTimer
member.summary: Starts the mail timer. whenever the mail timer is ticking, the user is not allowed to send a new e-mail. He can of course bypass this by closing remindme and restarting it for each e-mail, but that's fine.
